Comment: As a North Carolinian, I cannot tell you how happy this makes me. With some movement on the court and our new (*dynamite*) AG, we might actually make a little progress as a state, even while the country backslides all to hell.   Cold comfort, but I'll take what I can get these days. Griffin, the loser here, would've been an intractably bad justice *and* the precedent set by his winning this case could very well have unraveled across the national electoral stage by midterms.
Author: Angstrom_Wither
